text: "I Am the Walrus" is a 1967 song by The Beatles and taken from their soundtrack and EP Magical Mystery Tour. It was inspired by the 1871 poem of the same name and was banned by the BBC shortly after its release. == References == Category:1967 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:Oasis (band) songs Category:Styx songs Category:Leo Sayer songs Category:Psychedelic rock songs Category:Psychedelic pop songs
title: I Am the Walrus
